title: Mobile
content: Made bug fixes and performance improvements, both on Android and iOS.

title: Mobile
content: Added a Remove button to the product Shopping cart view.

title: Mobile
content: Allowed a user to add an item to cart by long pressing it on the category screen.

title: DevOps
content: Upgraded AOS AWS machines (packages and docker version).

title: DevOps
content: Added Windows server 2019 to the supported list.

title: SAP
content: Integrated with Public SAP Fiori Demo Site to support a full demo of SAP and non-SAP assets in the same script.

title: SAP
content: Provided a way to search for items that are not in the AOS catalog. Every time a user searches for an item and itâ€™s not in the AOS catalog, an option becomes available to extend the search through the new SAP UI (uses SAPUI5).

title: Web
content: Fixed an issue with the unsecured chat.
